property.name: expression
property.value: for $x in //NET_NAP_NETWORK_ACCESS_PT, $name in $x/NAP_NAME/@value, $server in $x/NET_OND_OUTGOING_NAP_DETAILS/OND_SERVER_ADDRESS/@value, $port in $x/NET_OND_OUTGOING_NAP_DETAILS/OND_CONNECTION_PORT/@value where $server != concat('%NAP_', $name, '_IP_ADDR%') and $port != concat('%NAP_', $name, '_PORT%') return $x
